detail_desc: Sports vest top in fast-drying, hole-patterned, functional fabric with narrow adjustable shoulder straps and a racer back. Seamless.
Knee-length lace dress with a round neckline and short puff sleeves. Concealed zip at the back and a seam under the bust with pleats for added width. Jersey lining.

Maxi dress in soft jersey with a V-neck at the front and low-cut neckline at the back. Wide shoulder straps that cross at the back, an elasticated seam at the waist and a long, pleated, heavily draping skirt. Lined.
Sleeveless top in soft jersey containing some linen with a small, pleated lace trim around the armholes and gathers in the sides for best fit.

5-pocket shorts in denim with ultra-flexible stretch that keeps them in shape while providing full movement and optimum comfort. Regular waist, zip fly and button, and skinny legs with turn-ups at the hems.
Warm-lined boots in imitation suede with lacing at the front, a zip in the side and a loop at the back. Fabric linings and insoles and rubber soles. Heel 3.5 cm.
Long-sleeved top in soft cotton jersey with a text print motif on the front.
Off-the-shoulder top in a cotton weave with elastication and a frill trim at the top. Short slits and ties at the sleeve-ends, and a rounded hem.

Block-coloured windbreaker in woven fabric with a high collar and lined, detachable hood with a hook and loop strap. Zip down the front with a chin guard, welt side pockets with a hook and loop fastening, and narrow elastication at the cuffs and hem. Lined.
Tights in a soft, fine-knit cotton blend with an elasticated waist.
Boxer shorts in cotton jersey with short legs, an elasticated waist and lined front.
5-pocket, ankle-length jeans in washed, slightly stretchy denim with a regular waist, zip fly and button and tapered legs.
Short, off-the-shoulder top in woven fabric made from a cotton blend with broderie anglaise, long sleeves and narrow elastication around the top, cuffs and hem.
Polo shirt in soft cotton piqué with a ribbed collar, button placket, short sleeves with narrow ribbed trims, and short slits in the sides.

Pyjamas in soft, printed organic cotton jersey. Top with a concealed press-stud on one shoulder (except in sizes 1½-4Y) and ribbing around the neckline and cuffs. Bottoms with an elasticated waist and ribbed hems.

Ankle-length jumpsuit in lightweight, washed cotton denim with a collar, concealed buttons down the front and a yoke with a pleat at the back. Flap chest pockets, diagonal side pockets and long sleeves with buttoned cuffs. Seam at the waist with a detachable tie belt, pleats at the front and shaping darts at the back. Zip fly and button and wide, gently tapered legs.

Short, wide dress in patterned chiffon with a mandarin collar, opening at the top and ties at the neckline. Gathered yoke at the back, long puff sleeves and cuffs with covered buttons. Gathered seam at the waist and a gathered seam at the hem with a wide flounce. Satin lining.
Long-sleeved top in soft fabric with dropped shoulders and ribbing around the neckline and hem. Press-stud on one shoulder.
Short lace dress with a V-neck and super-skinny, adjustable shoulder straps. Seam and concealed zip at the waist, and a flared skirt with box pleats. Lined.

department_name: Sneakers big girl inactive from s2
detail_desc: Slip-on trainers in imitation sheepskin with elastic gores in the sides and a loop at the back. Cotton canvas linings and insoles and rubber soles.
5-pocket, low-rise jeans in washed denim with hard-worn details, a zip fly and button, and slightly wider, tapered legs.
Leather belt with a metal buckle. Width 3 cm.
Turtle-neck jumper in a rib-knit mohair blend containing some wool with dropped shoulders and long sleeves.
Fitted T-shirt in soft organic cotton jersey.
Short dress in soft, ribbed jersey with lace trims, a V-neck and sewn-in wrapover at the front with decorative ties at one side. Long sleeves, a seam at the waist and a flared skirt. Unlined.
Sandals in soft leather with narrow straps at the front and long, narrow straps that tie around the ankles. Leather insoles.

Calf-length skirt woven in a soft modal blend with a high drawstring waist, an adjustable tab with press-studs at the sides and large patch front pockets with a decorative flap. Zip fly and press-studs, and a high slit front and back. Lined.
Calf-length skirt in a viscose weave. High waist with pleats, buttons down the front and high slits. Unlined.
Hat in a soft rib-knit cotton blend. Turn-up at the hem with a small appliqué at the front.
Leggings in sturdy jersey made from an organic cotton blend with an elasticated waist and a glitter print.
Shaping. 5-pocket bootcut jeans in washed denim with technical stretch that holds in and shapes the tummy, thighs and seat while keeping the jeans in shape. Regular waist with a zip fly and button.
T-shirt in cotton jersey and joggers in sweatshirt fabric. T-shirt with a print motif. Joggers with an elasticated drawstring waist, side pockets and ribbed hems. Soft brushed inside.
All-in-one pyjamas in soft, organic cotton jersey with long sleeves, long legs and press-stud fastenings.
Gently fitted, double-breasted jacket in cotton corduroy with notch lapels and flap front pockets. Lined.
Short dungaree dress in stretch cotton corduroy with straps that fasten with buttons at the front, an open, frill-trimmed chest pocket and buttons at the sides.
Jacket in organic cotton corduroy with a wide, pile-lined collar, buttons down the front, flap chest pockets with a button, side pockets, and buttoned cuffs. Unlined.
Short, fitted dress in jersey with narrow, adjustable shoulder straps and a drawstring at one side. Lined.
Long-sleeved dress in soft, patterned cotton jersey with a gathered seam at the waist and gently flared skirt. Unlined.

Parka in a cotton weave with a detachable hood, stand-up collar and zip down the front with a chin guard. Adjustable elastication at the back of the waist, a decorative drawstring, side pockets with a fake flap and press-stud, elasticated cuffs and a single back vent. Longer at the back. Lined.
Joggers in sweatshirt fabric with elasticated ribbing at the waist, pockets in the side seams and ribbed hems.
Twill cap with an appliqué on the front and an adjustable plastic fastener at the back.
Jumper in a soft, fine knit with a ribbed polo neck and ribbing at the cuffs and hem.
Short swim shorts in woven fabric with an elasticated drawstring waist. Soft mesh inner shorts.
Top in sweatshirt fabric with a print motif on the front, a lined hood, long sleeves and ribbing at the cuffs and hem. Soft brushed inside.
Sleeveless blouse in woven fabric with a small stand-up collar with a button and a V-shaped opening at the top. Draped, decorative flounce trim down the front and a rounded hem. Lined front.
Pull-on trousers in a cotton weave with an elasticated drawstring waist and side pockets. Tapered legs with seams at the knees and elasticated hems.
Cotton canvas trainers with lacing at the front and a loop at the back. Canvas linings and insoles and patterned soles.
Top in soft sweatshirt fabric with a jersey-lined drawstring hood. Dropped shoulders, long sleeves and ribbing at the cuffs and hem. Soft brushed inside. The polyester content of the top is recycled.
Microfibre and mesh Brazilian briefs with a mid waist, lined gusset, narrow sides and half-string back.
Short, puffy skirt in woven fabric made from recycled polyester. High waist with wide smocking to create a fitted style at the top. Lined.
5-pocket skirt in washed denim with technical stretch that holds in and shapes the tummy, thighs and bum while keeping the skirt in shape. High waist, zip fly and button, and a slit at the back.

Jacket in cotton twill with a small stand-up collar, shoulder tabs and a zip down the front. Chest and front pockets with a flap and press-stud, concealed elastication at the waist and cuffs with an opening and press-stud. Lined.
Long-sleeved jumper in a soft, fine-knit cotton blend with a roll-edge neckline, sewn on bow at the front, button on one shoulder and ribbing at the cuffs and hem.
Polo shirt in cotton piqué with a ribbed collar, button placket, short sleeves with ribbed trims, and slits in the sides.

Knee-length coat in woven fabric with notch lapels, a detachable belt with a round metal buckle at the waist and no fasteners. Adjustable tab and press-studs at the cuffs and discreet pockets in the side seams. Lined.
Fully lined bikini bottoms with a mid waist, ties at the sides and medium coverage at the back.
Off-the-shoulder top in ribbed jersey with a lace trim around the neckline and long sleeves.
Fine-knit ankle socks with elastication at the top.

Suit trousers in a stretch weave with a concealed hook-and-eye fastener and zip fly. Side pockets, welt back pockets and legs with creases. Skinny fit – a fit with slightly shorter legs that is close-fitting at the thighs, knees and ankles to create a completely fitted silhouette.
Short dress in soft slub jersey made from a cotton and modal blend with a V-neck. Narrow elastication and a detachable tie belt at the waist, and short cap sleeves with sewn-in turn-ups. Unlined.
Long-sleeved dress in soft, fine-knit cotton with buttons at the back of the neck, rib-knit frills down the front, a seam at the waist and flared skirt.
5-pocket, ankle-length jeans in washed cotton denim. Relaxed fit with an extra-high waist, zip fly and button, and tapered legs.
Ankle boots in imitation leather with a double-layer shaft, lacing at the front and a welt seam around the soles. Felted fabric linings and insoles and rubber soles.
Sports jacket in fast-drying functional fabric with a hood, zip down the front and front pockets.
Playsuit in a softly draping viscose weave with a V-neck, narrow, adjustable shoulder straps, a narrow, elasticated seam at the waist and side pockets.
Pyjamas in soft cotton jersey. Top with short sleeves and a print motif on the front. Shorts with an elasticated waist.
Top in soft fabric with a motif, long sleeves and ribbing around the neckline and hem.

Sturdy running backpack with a padded, mesh-covered back and padded, shaped shoulder straps that can be held together by an adjustable chest strap with a plastic fastener. The chest strap has a slide fastener for easy height adjustment. Wider, adjustable waist strap with a plastic fastener, one large compartment with an earphone outlet and mesh side compartment and one zipped inner compartment. Elastic hanger at the top. Lined. Size 19x42 cm.
Calf-length dress in jacquard-weave viscose with a concealed zip and hook-and-eye fastener at the back. Seam at the waist with a wide tie that creates a draped effect and wide, 3/4-length sleeves.
5-pocket jeans in washed denim with a regular waist, button fly and straight legs.
CONSCIOUS Joggers in soft organic cotton sweatshirt fabric with an elasticated drawstring waist and ribbed hems.
Polo shirt in premium cotton with a ribbed collar, button placket, short sleeves with ribbed trims, and a ribbed hem with short slits in the sides.
Fine-knit hat in soft cotton with a sequined motif and a ribbed hem.

Padded outdoor trousers in windproof, water-repellent functional fabric with reinforced hems and back . Adjustable elastic braces and a zip fly and press-stud. Elasticated hems, a reinforced elastic strap under the feet and a reflective strip on one leg. Lined. The trousers have a water-repellent coating without fluorocarbons.
Hooded jacket in fleece with a 3D pattern. Zip down the front with a chin guard, long raglan sleeves and narrow, covered elastication at the cuffs and hem.
Short-sleeved top in printed cotton jersey.

Wide, straight-cut shirt in woven fabric with a collar, concealed buttons down the front and a yoke at the back. Chest pocket, low dropped shoulders, buttoned cuffs and a rounded hem. Longer at the back.
Jersey crop tops with narrow adjustable shoulder straps.
Sports tights in fast-drying functional fabric with wide ribbing to hold in and shape the waist, and a lace pattern at the knees.
